org.hps.record.epics

Class EpicsData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.epics.EpicsData

  • public final class EpicsData
extends Object
    This is an API for reading and writing EPICS data to LCIO events, as well as parsing the data from a CDATA section within an EVIO string data bank. The read(EventHeader) method should be used to create one of these objects from an LCIO event. The keys are stored in the string parameters of the collection, because GenericObject cannot persist string data.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static EpicsData read(EventHeader event)

        Read data into this object from an LCIO event using the default collection name.

        This is the primary method for users to read the EPICS data into their Drivers in the Driver.process(EventHeader) method.

        Parameters:
        event - the LCIO event
        Returns:
        the EPICS data from the event or null if none exists

      • read

        Parameters:

        collectionName - the collection name
        Returns:
        the EPICS data from the LCIO event
